data.title: Classic pizza
data.text: I have been going to Shakey's since the '70's. This was my first visit back in a long time. Seemed strange about 80% of the tables inside were reserved for parties, made it difficult to find a table. For me the food was good but seemed overpriced.

data.title: PCM
data.text: Pizza , chicken and mojos need i say more??? The brunch buffet is super small but well worth it for pizza lovers. Its around 12$ ,theres pizza , chicken , mojos, spaghetti, rice, salad bar and cinnamon rolls i think. What i usally do is stack a plate full of pizza and another with chicken and mojos , get some marinara from the spaghetti and ranch and use that as dipping sauce ( its really bomb) . Pitchers of beer are expensive and the micheladas are premade cans that budlight/budweiser makes. Not bad just feel cheated. Overall great for kids to play games and grown ups to watch sports. Food is what i expect from a pizza joint like this , would reccomend.

data.title: BEST PLACE FOR HUNGRY TEENS
data.text: After a long trip downtown to have Sweet 16 dresses altered, four girls and I thought we'd stop here for lunch. We ordered the pizza, chicken, and mojo special, which made the girls happy. By the time we were done every platter was empty! Great quick lunch for hungry teenagers..

data.title: Best pizza mojos
data.text: Good pizza and best chicken. Service so so. Need to work on cleaning ness.a lot manager turnover so inconsistent

data.title: Old Time Pizza Place with Good Pizza
data.text: Shakey's is a fun place to go for pizza.  Its a long time restaurant in El Monte and has the right decor for a pizza.  Yummy pizza - pepperoni please is my favorite at this restaurant.  They offer other pizzas as well.

data.title: Best Pizza - Period!!
data.text: I travel to Southern California about once or twice each year and I'm always looking forward having pizza at Shakey's. What makes their Pizza stand out compared to other pizza places and chains is their pizza sauce.. I usually order a medium or even large thin crust with pepperoni or mushrooms with extra sauce.. That combination is by far my favorite Pizza anywhere and I've had Pizza in many countries and cities, including Italy, New York, Florida and many other places and if I have to pick on what my favorite Pizza is, it's the thin crust, extra sauce mushroom and Pepperoni Pizza at Shakey's.. Too bad that their only Florida location in Homestead has closed their doors.. The Shakey's location that I most frequenly visit while staying in the LA area is the one on Valley Blvd. in El Monte but all the other locations that I've visited had the same deliscious Pizza..

data.title: Best chicken & jojos, great pizza!
data.text: I've really missed this place! I haven't been here since I was a kid. The restraunt has changed a little but the service and food is still the same. My boyfriend & I met up with family here and had a great time. The chicken, jojos, and pizza is just like I remember it. We playd in the arcade like I used to do and loved it!
